contest-event.event-date:
July 11, 1903 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section) 10 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-a
Test Piece Contest
Lortzing
New Pavilion, Mountain Ash, Glamorgan
Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £3. Best cornet and euphonium - Tillery Colliery. 13th annual contest. 7 bands competed.
June 15, 2013, 6:59 p.m. July 25, 2016, 3:59 p.m.
1 Tillery Collieries Band John Griffiths
2 Aberaman H. Bentley
3 Ferndale Samuel Radcliffe
4 Abertillery Silver J. A. Locksley
Unknown Result Aberdare Town William Layman
Unknown Result Pentre Volunteers J. Sheridan
Unknown Result Ystalyfera Public Charles Anthony Morgan
